Basihyal Lara corallicola bụ ụdị orchid nke ana-ahu na Florida, Bahamas, Cuba, Hispaniola, na Puerto Rico.
Basiphyllaea corallicola bụ ahịhịa mgbọrọgwụ dị n'ala ruo sentimita ịrị anọ n'ogologo, nwere tubers n'okpuru ala
Akwụkwọ ya dị warara na elliptic, ruo sentimita ịrị abụọ na ise n'ogologo
A na-ebu okooko osisi n'ime ihe ruru okooko osisi iri, nke ọ bụla na-acha odo odo na-acha akwụkwọ ndụ akwụkwọ ndụ na egbugbere ọnụ ọcha.
